text:
@mmcauliff A mask goes for 150$ rn when it was 15$ a month ago. Eh. Let them #MAGA2020 #maga wear those #wuhan made red hats on their face instead of masks if no $💁 It's all fine guys, just as @POTUS said - it's like a cold...🙄
PS. Libs,wash ur hands,stay away from magats.
